text: Procrastination is the behavior of delaying actions or tasks to a later time. It can be a very bad thing to do because you do not get enough things done.Viewpoint: Why do we procrastinate so much? BBC News Magazine. == References == == Other websites == *CalPoly - Procrastination - analysis of procrastinating behavior and possible cures *Article about a possible cure for procrastination Category:Habits Category:Human behavior
title: Procrastination
